slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Ceme 7,8,9 is a game where you guess which player has a higher total card value than the banker.

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: You can bet on Player 1, 2, or 3. You can also place side bets on a playerâ€™s 7, 8, 9 or combinations of 7,8,9 for significantly higher payouts!

slide-3.title: Hokky Numbers
content: During specific rounds, Hokky Numbers appear, offering double the normal payout! Hokky Numbers only apply to side bets on one of the Players.
